mapper.select: SELECT "olderDay-requests" name,COUNT(*) FROM log WHERE DATE_FORMAT(time,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(date_sub(now(),interval #{older} day),'%Y-%m-%d') UNION SELECT "olderDay-visitors",COUNT(distinct ip) FROM log WHERE DATE_FORMAT(time,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(date_sub(now(),interval #{older} day),'%Y-%m-%d') UNION SELECT "olderDay-pages",COUNT(distinct url) FROM log WHERE DATE_FORMAT(time,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(date_sub(now(),interval #{older} day),'%Y-%m-%d') UNION SELECT "olderDay-reads",COUNT(*) FROM log WHERE DATE_FORMAT(time,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(date_sub(now(),interval #{older} day),'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT "today-requests" name,COUNT(*) FROM log where DAY(time)=DAY(now()) and MONTH(time)=MONTH(now()) and YEAR(time)=YEAR(now()) UNION SELECT "today-visitors",COUNT(distinct ip) FROM log where DAY(time)=DAY(now()) and MONTH(time)=MONTH(now()) and YEAR(time)=YEAR(now()) UNION SELECT "today-pages",COUNT(distinct url) FROM log where DAY(time)=DAY(now()) and MONTH(time)=MONTH(now()) and YEAR(time)=YEAR(now()) and url not like '%.css' and url not like '%.js' UNION SELECT "today-reads",COUNT(*) FROM log where id in(select log_id from article_viewer) and DAY(time)=DAY(now()) and MONTH(time)=MONTH(now()) and YEAR(time)=YEAR(now());
SELECT country,province,city,count FROM region ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT ua,COUNT(ua) from log GROUP BY ua ORDER BY COUNT(ua) DESC
SELECT HOUR(time),COUNT(id) FROM log where DAY(time)=DAY(now()) and MONTH(time)=MONTH(now()) and YEAR(time)=YEAR(now()) GROUP BY HOUR(time)
SELECT ua,COUNT(id) FROM log where DATE_FORMAT(time,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') and (ua like '%spider%' or ua like '%bot%') GROUP BY ua ORDER BY COUNT(id) DESC;
SELECT ua,COUNT(id) FROM log where ua like '%spider%' or ua like '%bot%' GROUP BY ua;
SELECT url,COUNT(id) FROM log where (ua like '%spider%' or ua like '%bot%') AND (url NOT LIKE '%.js' AND url NOT LIKE '%.css') GROUP BY url ORDER BY COUNT(id) DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM log WHERE (ua like '%spider%' or ua like '%bot%') AND time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(),interval 7 day) and NOW() GROUP BY DAY(time) ORDER BY time
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM log WHERE (ua like '%spider%' or ua like '%bot%') GROUP BY HOUR(time) ORDER BY HOUR(time);

SELECT "today-sqls" name ,COUNT(id) number FROM sql_log WHERE DATE_FORMAT(time,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') UNION SELECT "today-sqls-response-time" name ,AVG(delay) number FROM sql_log WHERE DATE_FORMAT(time,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') UNION SELECT "today-response-time" name ,AVG(delay) number FROM log WHERE DATE_FORMAT(time,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
SELECT HOUR(time) hour,COUNT(id) number FROM sql_log WHERE DATE_FORMAT(time,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY HOUR(time)
SELECT 'today' name,AVG(residence_time) number FROM stay_time WHERE DATE_FORMAT(time,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') UNION SELECT 'history' name,AVG(residence_time) number FROM stay_time
SELECT DISTINCT ip,COUNT(id) number FROM stay_time GROUP BY ip ORDER BY COUNT(id) DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT url,COUNT(id) number FROM stay_time GROUP BY url ORDER BY COUNT(id) DESC LIMIT 5
